Articles.Content:
You probably can't talk about sequels when it comes to textures, but here's a sequel to that Jool texture I made earlier. Enjoy!

(I kinda feel that it should really come with a somewhat brighter atmosphere)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/GBYnr)

Download

[http://www./view/pv4ne0tmhvz3jcd/Jool1.png](http://www./view/pv4ne0tmhvz3jcd/Jool1.png)
Oh man, that's awesome! Great work! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Looks kinda watermelony. 

A version with more dark/contrasted green might work better, a bit more stock-ish. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
